item.title: [PI] Donator Shop?
item.dc:creator: @Gnartox Gnartox
item.description:
@Gnartox wrote:

Trying to make a simple donator shop with an if statement.

This is the code Iâ€™m using. I put it in ActionHandler.java

case 659: if (c.memberStatus >= 2) { c.getShops().openShop(9); break; } else { c.sendMessage("Sorry, this shop is for donators only."); break; }

When I compile I get this.

No such file or directory src/server/model/players/ActionHandler.java:900: cannot find symbol symbol : variable memberStatus location: class server.model.players.Client if (c.memberStatus >= 2) { ^

Read full topic
